task_definition_name: Mifos Mobile Wallet - Create A Round And Square Logo For MifosPay App
description:
MifosPay doesn’t have a logo of its own. The objective is to create a round and a square logo for MifosPay App. Some Suggestions - Try playing letter ‘M’ and ‘P’ with something like money. It is only a suggestion and you can create it differently too. Also, the best logo chosen will be the official logo for the MifosPay App. You have to submit a high res, native file of the logo as well as png (transparent)  and jpg of logo. 
If you need help, be sure to post your question to our [developer mailing list](http://mifos.org/resources/community/communications/#mailing-lists) or email the corresponding mentors assigned to the task or you can message on [Gitter Channel](https://gitter.im/openMF/mifos) too.

High Resolution Mifos Logo - https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/0ByeK44WJrHIvYnk1M0ZFemJSNkE
